Title: Joyeux Noel
Actors: Diane Kruger, Natalie Dessay, Benno Fürmann, Rolando Villazón
Plot: In December 1914, an unofficial Christmas truce on the Western Front allows soldiers from opposing sides of the First World War to gain insight into each other's way of life.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 11 nominations.
Production: Artemis Productions, Nord-Express Productions [fr], Senator Film Produktion GmbH [de]
